english: He had aroused three irreconcilable feuds in capri .
chinese: 他在卡普里岛引起了三场不可和解的冤仇。

english: To make enemy , talk ; to make friend , listen
chinese: 多讲结冤仇；多听交朋友。

english: There is a lot of ill blood between them
Your grudges , resentments , frustrations , and jealousies will finally disapear
chinese: 你的忌恨、冤仇、挫败和嫉妒之心终将消失。

english: Your grudges , resentments , frustrations and jealousies will finally disappear
chinese: 你的嫉恨、冤仇、挫败和妒嫉之心终将消失。
冤仇造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Hareton s blood would be required at his hands ; and there lay immense consolation in that thought
chinese: 哈里顿的冤仇必报这么一想不禁感到极大的安慰。

english: What does the angel of light or the angel of darkness say to that mind , at once implacable and generous
chinese: 光明天使或黑暗之神对那个冤仇难解而同时又宽宏大量的头脑到底说了些什么话呢？
